no_notification: You do not have any new notifications.
invited_board: invited you to join the board
confirm_logout: Are you sure log out of your account?
confirm_remove_member: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the board?
des_public: Anyone can view this board, but only members can make changes.
des_private: Only board members can view and edit the content on this board.
confirm_delete_column: This action will permanently delete your column and its card, are you sure?
confirm_delete_card: This action will permanently delete your card, are you sure?
confirm_remove_cover: This action will remove your card cover, are you sure?
emailReminderInfo: Email reminders will be sent to all members of this card.
dueDateBeforeStartDate: Due date cannot be before start date.
noPreview: There is no preview available for this attachment.
enter_2fa_code_description:
A 6-digit OTP code has been sent to your email: {{email}}.
Enter it below and click Confirm to verify your account.
enableConfirmDescription: Enabling 2FA increases security. You will be logged out and need to log in again.
disableConfirmDescription: Disabling 2FA may reduce your account security. Are you sure you want to proceed?
toastEnabled: 2FA has been enabled! Please log in again.
upload_avatar_tooltip: Upload a new image to update avatar immediately.
change_password_description: You have to login again after successfully changing your password. Continue?
change_password_success: Successfully changed your password, please login again.
please_verify_email_message:
• We've sent a verification link to your email: {{email}}.

• Please check your inbox (and spam folder) and click the link to activate your account.

• If you have already verified your email, you can return to the login page to sign in.
password_invalid: Password must include at least 1 letter, a number, and at least 8 characters.
file_type_invalid: File type is invalid. Only image types are accepted.
register_subtitle: Create a new account to get started
register_success_message: Registration successful! Please verify your email before logging in.
account_verified: Account verified! You can login now.
newTitle: Stay on Top of Every Task
subtitle: From daily checklists to big projects — KanTrack helps you visualize progress, coordinate teams, and keep everything under control.
deviceBlocker_title: This application is not yet supported on mobile devices
deviceBlocker_description: Please access KanTrack from a desktop computer for the best experience.
confirm_leave_board: Are you sure you want to leave the board?
confirm_assign_admin: Are you sure you want to assign this member as an admin?
confirm_delete_board: Are you sure you want to delete this board? This action cannot be undone.
access_board_deleted: The board you are trying to access has been deleted.
access_removed: You no longer have access to this board.
cannot_leave_as_last_member: You are the last member and cannot leave.
cannot_leave_as_last_owner: You are the only admin. Assign another member as an admin.
removed_user_from_board: You have been removed from the board.
file_too_many: You can upload up to 10 files only.
title: Title
min_title: Title must be at least {{limit}} characters.
private_board_description: This board is private. You don’t have permission to access it.
board_removed_realtime: A board in your lists was deleted.
exist_invitee: Invitee is already a member of this board.
email_password_incorrect: Your email or password is incorrect.
account_is_not_active: Your account is not active, please verify email.
expired_otp: OTP expired. Please request a new one.
code_resent: A new verification code has been sent to your email.
resend_code_or_login_again: Please wait 1 minute before resending the code or logging in again.
